And in fact, Memorial Day, by definition, is a federal holiday set aside to acknowledge exclusively the servicemen and women who have fallen in the line of duty - not to be confused with Veterans Day, which honors all members, both living and dead, who served with the United States military. Still, longstanding traditions on the last Monday of May and the days leading up to it propel to the forefront of a nation's conscious acts of sacrifice and honor often lost at the summer's cusp among barbecues and swimming pool openings. And for acting service members, Command Sgt. Maj. Phillip Cantrell, Regimental Sgt. Major of the Old Guard's 3rd U.S. Infantry Regiment, told CBS News, the fruits of those traditions offer them "the greatest sense of pride and honor to be an American."

Topic.Title: America is blessed to have Barack Obama as its president

Message.Msg: Yes, Bush and Obama have been 2 of the most destructive leaders in our lifetimes. It's doubtful if America can ever recover from 16 years of their destructive leadership. The dems have been totally taken over by mindless fanatics. The Bush fanatics are making good progress in taking over the republican party, but at least there, people are still fignting back. They can't always win against this evil. Romney was proof of that. but the struggle continues. Unfortunately our election process is not secure. That is the obvious weak point that America has, and it is being exploted by our enemys in addition to entrenched politicians who just want to stay in power and are willing to ignore the problem if it means they can keep their positions of power. America will rapidly become weaker as the economy is looted and the population is flooded with immigrants who can't understand american democracy. At some point the destructive policies will be too obvious to ignore. Then things will change! One way or another.
Well, if you consider being called an #$%$ an "honor", then you're the most decorated man in world history.
try again ahkmed, err spart, break it up, or use a dash between letters

That might be a valid excuse except obama continued Bush's destructive policies and even increased the intensity of the bad policies. This is not an accident. This is done to reshape America into a failed state. These people are expert at taking down a country from the inside, and are using this tactic worldwide.

"Here's better logic hooz..Christians will expose their bad apples." Really, joe? I never noticed that. Did you ever read the story of Medgar Evers? As spartacus would say, Google it. Or how about the Mississippi civil rights workers' murders? Or the 16th Street Baptist Church bombing? I could go on... and on and on and on but, suffice to say, a lot of murders took place and nobody ever seemed to see anything. Devout Christians would place their hands on a bible and swear to tell the truth... and then lie repeatedly. How hard could it have been to solve these horrendous crimes? Turns out, very hard. But that's just how Christians are. They are natural born liars. I saw a history-oriented story on television about a mother and son who were the last surviving members of a family of five. The dad and two other sons were killed, dismembered, and found at the bottom of a lake... after church, of course; it would be immoral to blow a guy's head off and dismember the body if you miss church. Let's assume that 86.73% of a Christians are murderous thugs. Now assume that the other 13.27% are too cowardly to turn them in. That doesn't make the 13.27% immoral. Do I have that about right?

You can read all kinds of examples hooz. It is a matter of comparison. And Christians that I know would turn in a felon in a heartbeat. A Muslim? They will provide them sactuary. They can preach all they want about how good they are, but until they show the world they will expose the Radicals in their ranks they get no acceptance from most decent folks.

Funny you mention FOIA. Holder's Justice Dept. tried to institute a policy by which agencies hit by FOIA requests they didn't want to answer would be permitted to lie and claim the requested documents did not exist.

Bush didn't try to stop it. He exploited it. He had a program to try to make 5 million hispanic families homeowners, because he thought that could turn them into Republicans. A BBC doco told the story.
Salaam and Shalom are the same word.

Freedom to speak is a god-given unalienable right.

Message.Title: Drop Your Gun
Message.Msg: When the police tells someone drop your gun, he or she better drop whats in their hands immediately. Even if the person is on their own propert or trying to protect themselves from an assailant. Failure to comply may mean a death sentence even if the person is innocent and the gun in ones hand is not loaded. Some cops will shoot to kill and ask questions later. While each circumstance is different, cops should be better trained to avoid the immediate reaction of the use of deadly force.
If someone died to give me the right to speak, then someone else can die to take it away. Nobody died to give it or take it. It's a god-given unalienable right.

Your name fits you well. An "unalienable right" which is defended and preserved by enlistees and in the past draftees. And fwiw, back in the days of the draft many enlistees would have been drafted but enlisted to avoid the draft in order to have other options such as getting an MOS in a field they were interested in.
So correct. Freedom isn't free.

You've got the responsibility for doing the right thing on the wrong party. When the cop says to drop the gun, drop what you have. Cops get called to home addresses all the time, and they do not want to approach someone, and get killed because the person didn't obey the order, and the guy pointed the gun, and killed the cop. Ain't that hard to understand..."DROP THE GUN!"
Then I suggest you get down on your knees and thank God for providing the enlistees and draftess who died to defend and preserve your right to speak.

Iv'e got a coment about your phrase: "Some cops will shoot to kill and ask questions later. While each circumstance is different, cops should be better trained to avoid the immediate reaction of the use of deadly force" Whan i lived in the SF bay area (some would incorrectly refer to it as liberalsville) trigger happy dirty harry wonna be's cops always shot to kill and asked no questions later. Those cops took they're paid administrative leave, went golfing, and returned to duty shortly. As it has been said leave no wounded or maimed suspect alive that could turn around sue the city, or explain how the cop shot them in the back face down on the ground. Cops have at their disposal an arsenal of non-lethal weapons that continues to grow and kevlar. Life is cheap in this over crowd society of mediocrity. Yes, I concur that "cops should be better trained to avoid the immediate reaction of the use of deadly force". However, I see cops like bears. Once a bear has had the taste of human blood the only way to deal with that bear is to either move they so far away from civilization they're never seen again or in the alternative remove their teeth. I realize cops have tough jobs. However, I know many cops that voluntarily left the vocation of engineering to become cops because of all the benies. Cops today see themselves as judge, jury and executioner and that needs to come out and society needs to demand suspects taken alive.

My name fits me better than you know. Defending and preserving is not "giving". They can defend and preserve my god-given rights all they want, but nobody can tell me they gave them to me, You might as well claim they gave me my life. We should bring back the draft. And we should draft not just cannon-fodder but all the skills the military needs--dentists, engineers, managers, accountants, computer scientists, actuaries. If we did that then we wouldn't have any wars.
